data.text:
@SenHydeSmith More than 40,000 Iranians have lost their lives. Not for a nuclear deal. The Islamic regime’s survival means continued missile and nuclear threats, including to the U.S. We demand regime change. Reza Pahlavi is the leader of Iran’s democratic transition.
#IranMassacre #Iran https://t.co/94JljupDOb

@SenHydeSmith We call on Western governments to recognize and invite #RezaPahlavi. He represents a democratic future for Iran and a reliable partner for the West on stability, human rights, and regional security.

@SenHydeSmith God doesn’t hear the prayer of someone who won’t speak out against the ICE horrors that are being carried out against our citizens and other HUMAN BEINGS!  I also don’t believe He likes how you run cover for the largest child sex trafficking ring in world history.

@SenHydeSmith I’d like to watch you fight for the #MajorRichardStarAct. A bill that has this many cosponsors should be an easy touchdown. Why are we letting obstructionists like @SenatorWicker hijack democracy? Stand up for combat disabled vets who stood up for you on the battlefield!
@SenHydeSmith Get off social media and pass the save America act.
@SenHydeSmith Haha, you guys are killing it this weekend...all praying #partyofracists
